https://github.com/the-road-to-learn-react/react-redux-example

React Redux Example
Build Status Slack Greenkeeper badge

Found in The Road to learn React
react-redux-example

Features
uses:
React (create-react-app)
Redux
Installation
git clone git@github.com:the-road-to-learn-react/react-redux-example.git
cd react-redux-example
npm install
npm start
visit http://localhost:3000/
